snippet.title: D PISTOLS - European Version 100% All Trophies + Platinum PS4
snippet.description:
Developer: Xitilon
Publisher: Xitilon

https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP5645-CUSA35908_00-3748952999785240

https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP5464-CUSA35907_00-4587669198751261

https://store.playstation.com/en-sg/product/HP5361-CUSA35910_00-4137992582908385

https://store.playstation.com/ja-jp/product/JP5299-CUSA35909_00-9641977949096632

Links to stores are shown above.

They have separate list's so that's 4 stacks to be got.

Controls
X or Square button - Fire (probs can use circle or triangle as well, but i never tried those out.
Options - Change settings to your own preference.

Might take you a few tries to get used to the mechanics of the game. I used the square button to fire as it felt more comfortable for me, to fire up & down press and hold the fire button that your using.

Concentrate on the Nerves of Steel trophy (Get a 50x bonus) first, then Getting Cleaner And Cleaner trophy (Survive 2 minutes) Do this trophy either from the top or bottom whatever feels more comfortable for you, i did this from the top. All remaining trophies will fall in to place as your going along.

Game has 12 trophies attached to it 11 Gold, 1 Platinum

Full Trophy List Below

Complete the game
Get all trophies
Platinum

Biologist
Destroy 50 parasites
Gold

Immunologist
Destroy 100 parasites
Gold

Fumigator
Destroy 200 parasites
Gold

Did I Miss A Shot?
Get a 25x bonus
Gold

Nerves Of Steel
Get a 50x bonus
Gold

A Long Task Ahead
Survive 30 seconds
Gold

Parasite Rodeo
Survive 1 minute
Gold

Getting Cleaner And Cleaner
Survive 2 minutes
Gold

Fumigation Tent? Set
Get a score of 500
Gold

Inmune System A+
Get a score of 1000
Gold

Vamonos Pest
Get a score of 2500
Gold
